attributes.additional_details:
Would the Goverment please discuss the decision of Arsenal Football Club to reduce the amount of away FA Cup ticket allocations to Everton,Spurs and Liverpool Football Clubs but able to supply to Coventry City the full amount of 9000 tickets.

Who came up with these decisions and why can't Everton Football Club have 9000 seats in the Lower Tier were there is ample room.

Would the Sports Minister hold immediate talks with the relevant parties and enforce Arsenal to give the full allocation of 9000 tickets to Everton Football Club

rejection.details: This is a matter for the football authorities.
